title: Metamagnetism and canted antiferromagnetic ordering in two monomeric CoII complexes with 1-(2-pyrimidyl)piperazine. Hirshfeld surface analysis and theoretical studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11557-11569
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00716F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anissa Hannachi, Youness El Bakri, Kandasamy Saravanan, Carlos J. Gómez-García, Hatem A. Abuelizz, Rashad Al-Salahi, Wajda Smirani
The current research presents the magnetic properties of two cobalt complexes and theoretical studies have been used to explain this behavior.
